articles.title: Armed Forces Ministry Blasts S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Armed Forces Ministry Blasts S. Korean Warmongers
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK National Defence Commission issued the following statement Wednesday:
					The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army on March 5 stated to the world the resolute determination of the army and people of the DPRK in the face of the anti-DPRK hostile acts that have become all the more undisguised on the part of the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					The south Korean military warmongers have not yet come to their senses and are still going reckless.
					
					On March 6, the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff let the chief of its operation headquarters call for "punishing" even "commanding forces", to say nothing of "bases" and "reinforcements" by mobilizing military means if the DPRK commences actions.
					
					On March 8, the puppet Ministry of Defense also got its spokesman to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the north and bluster that "it would remove the north's regime from the the earth in reflection of the will of mankind" if the nuclear-armed north launches an all-out action. 
					
					Defense Minister nominee Kim Pyong Gwan, who will replace military hooligan Kim Kwan Jin, also said that they will counter the north's all-out action with "regime change or toppling of its regime including psychological warfare".
					
					This frenzy kicked up by the south Korean warmongers is no way irrelevant with the swish of skirt made by the owner of Chongwadae.
					
					Ill-boding voices are being heard from the inner room of Chongwadae. They call for maintaining a high alert posture for "security", saying that "a country can not be protected only with weapons" and "a country concentrating on beefing up military muscle only including nuclear weapons will bring about its own destruction."
					
					Matter is that all these developments are timed to coincide with the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle nuclear war rehearsals that have got into full swing.
					
					The DPRK cannot interpret those moves otherwise than a repetition of the long bankrupt confrontation stance of the Lee Myung Bak regime and an expression of utter ignorance of the precious asset of the nation. 
					
					An army of the nation and people possessed of nuclear weapons can always win a victory in the struggle against formidable enemies and reliably guarantee the grandeur and security of the country.
					
					This is a stark reality unfolded by the world where the law of the jungle governs and a bitter lesson drawn by the DPRK in the decades-long arduous confrontation with the U.S. 
					
					They, however, cried out for "abandoning nuclear weapons", the asset of which the nation can be proud before the world, and "giving up Songun" aimed at preserving peace on this land from outside forces' aggression and war moves in disregard of this stark reality. These are little short of jargons made by the idiots who lack any ability to judge the reality.
					
					 The DPRK launched an all-out action to foil the war moves of the robbers attacking in groups in order to violate the sovereignty of the nation, but the south Korean trigger-happy forces painted it as "provocation". Not content with this, they are working hard to deprive the DPRK of its nukes built to defend the country and the nation. This amounts to a thrice-cursed act of treachery.
					
					 The people and servicepersons of south Korea must turn their rifles on the warmongers in response to the just all-out action of the DPRK, well aware that the sovereignty of the country and the destiny of the nation can never be left to such traitors to the nation.
					
					 What they are doing is an anachronistic act of treachery as they are blindly following the brigandish assertion of their U.S. master keen to put the whole country and the nation under its control, unable to discern what is justice, what is injustice and what is hypocrisy.
					
					 Whatever the U.S. and other big powers decide, resorting to high-handed and arbitrary practices, can by no means be justice.
					
					 Whatever resolutions the UN Security Council adopts cannot be truth as it is a mere voting machine bereft of impartiality and equity.
					
					 Injustice and lies can never become justice and truth and their hypocrisy is bound to be revealed in face of the times and history.
					
					 The DPRK army and people's unyielding struggle to protect the sovereignty of the nation and the right to existence and defend its supreme interests is the just one as proved by history and the truth indicated by the times.
					
					 They have had access to precision nuclear deterrence that has become diversified, tightening their belts, and chosen the arduous road of Songun out of many other alternatives. It is because herein lie justice and truth.
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers can not understand the reality because they are traitors engrossed in sycophancy toward the U.S.
					
					 A man who takes to flunkeyism is bound to become an idiot and a nation that turns to flunkeyism is bound to ruin.
					
					 This is the law proven by long human history.
					
					 The DPRK's army and people will not remain an onlooker to the south Korean warmongers' disgraceful act of transferring the wartime operation control, life and soul of the army, to the U.S. and offering the soldiers as canon fodder to their master.
					
					 That's why the DPRK chose the U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers following it as the major target of the all-out action for defending the sovereignty and the first target of merciless strike.
					
					 The warmongers would be well advised to keep in mind that the Armistice Agreement is no longer valid and the DPRK is not restrained by the north-south declaration on non-aggression.
					
					 What is left to be done now is an action of justice and merciless retaliation of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should come to their senses.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nan Greets President-elect of Kenya
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nan Greets President-elect of Kenya
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nan, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Uhuru Muigai Kenyatta, president-elect of Kenya.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, wishing the Kenyan president success in his responsible work for national unity and the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Maltese PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Maltese PM
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Joseph Muscat on his election as Maltese prime minister.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development, expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Indian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with new Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Ajay Kumar Sharma, who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: WFP Representative Presents Credentials
articles.content:
WFP Representative Presents Credentials
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday received credentials from Dierk Stegen, representative of the World Food Programme here.
					 After receiving the credentials Pak had a talk with the representative.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Held in Cities, Counties
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Held in Cities, Counties
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in Kaesong, Orang, Ryongrim, Jongju, Sijung, Sonchon, Kangryong, Rangrim, Jasong and other cities and counties to support the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were service personnel, officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 At the rallies speakers fully supported the statement which declared the will of all service personnel and people to annihilate the enemies.
					
					 Service personnel and people are convinced of a sure victory and fully determined to annihilate the enemies, upon receiving the statement which calls on all of them to turn out in an all-out action for final victory, they stressed, adding:
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will never miss the long-awaited golden opportunity but settle accounts with the aggressors at one blow by employing the war method of Korean style when they make a provocation.
					
					 They will hold in high esteem for all ages Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, banner of eternal victory of Songun Korea, and safeguard the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the cost of their lives under whatever storm and stress.
					
					 Each of them will hold a rifle on one hand and a hammer or a sickle on the other to turn their residing areas into impregnable fortress and mercilessly annihilate the U.S. imperialists and their followers by dint of army-people unity if they dare provoke.
					
					 The speakers called upon all service personnel and people to get united closely behind Kim Jong Un to resolutely foil the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and honorably defend the sovereignty of the country and the socialist homeland.

articles.title: More Youths Volunteer for Military Service
articles.content:
More Youths Volunteer for Military Service
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Young people across the country turned out in a sacred war for national defence in response to the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The number of young people who volunteered to join or rejoin the KPA has reached one million and hundreds of thousands.
					
					 The officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League are full of firm determination to display the spirit of the Songun youth vanguard.
					
					 More than 200 000 youths petitioned to join or rejoin the army in Pyongyang only.
					
					 Hundreds of thousands of youths including workers, farmers and intellectuals across the country vowed to stand at the posts for national defence.
					
					 Youths of industrial establishments and co-op farms in different parts of the country including the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex and Township Co-op Farm, Phyonggang County, volunteered to join the KPA.
					
					 Meetings for petitioning to join or rejoin the army took place at universities and collages across the country including Kim Il Sung University and Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, and hundreds of thousands of youths petitioned to join the army.
					
					 Many students of the graduating classes at secondary schools in different parts of the country ardently petitioned to join the army.
					
					 Many students who had entrance examinations to schools of higher level also petitioned to join the army, instead of going to universities.
					
					 Meanwhile, officials of the youth league and school youth and children provided over 169 000 pieces of aid materials in at least 150 kinds when taking the country as a whole and sent them to service personnel. -0-

articles.title: Experts in International and Legal Affairs Interviewed
articles.content:
Experts in International, Legal Affairs Interviewed 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and their allies, who have escalated hostile acts against the DPRK over its peaceful satellite launch, are now holding large war exercises against the backdrop of another "resolution on sanctions" against it.
					 Experts in international and legal affairs were interviewed by KCNA Wednesday in this regard. 
					
					 Kim Ul Ho, vice-director of the International Affairs Institute, said that satellite launch is a legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 Recently the U.S. and Japan launched ballistic missiles but the UN Security Council has not taken this issue up for discussion, he said, and went on:
					
					 The "resolution" on the DPRK, in the final analysis, was a violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK, a country that has unswervingly followed the path of independence, Songun and socialism. The DPRK's peaceful satellite launch was branded as a ballistic missile launch, a reflection of inveterate repugnance against it. The approval of the "resolution" was a serious violation of international law and an insult to it.
					
					 Hong Chol Hwa, director of the Legislation Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said that the another "resolution on sanctions" that was approved on March 7 does not deserve even a passing note as it was retrogressive remaking of the illegal past "resolutions".
					
					 Completely unacceptable are documents of the UN Security Council, which blindly dances to the tune of the U.S., a country ill-famed for high-handed and arbitrary practices and swindling, bereft of impartiality, objectivity and equity.
					
					 Ho Hon Gil, vice-director of the Supreme Court, cited facts to prove that the U.S. is a main architect of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and an arch criminal who made the issue next to impossible.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Many Koreans who were taken to Japan for military service and forced labor for the Japanese imperialists became the first and direct victims of the U.S. imperialists' nuclear attacks on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945.
					
					 During the Korean War, the U.S. planned to form a radioactivity corridor zone on the Korean Peninsula and blackmailed Koreans with A-bomb, forcing lots of families to live separated in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 After their occupation of south Korea, the U.S. imperialists shipped nuclear weapons to south Korea. On January 29, 1958 they brought those weapons to south Korea in wanton violation of international law including NPT. They have turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East. In the new century, too, the U.S. has continued nuclear blackmails against the DPRK after putting it in the list of targets of preemptive nuclear strike. 
					
					 Hong Chol Hwa said that the DPRK's third underground nuclear test marked an important occasion in defending the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The situation proves that the successful nuclear test is a just measure for defending the sovereignty of the country and its right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes and safeguarding the right of the nation to existence, he stressed, adding:
					
					 There can be no settlement of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula unless the U.S. makes a switchover in its nuclear policy by which it regards the nuclear weapons as a basic means for stifling the DPRK.

articles.title: Participants in National Meeting of Light Industry Arrive
articles.content:
Participants in National Meeting of Light Industrial Workers Arrive
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Those to participate in a national meeting of light industrial workers arrived here on Wednesday.
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that light industry was set as the main target in economic construction for this year and a national meeting of light industrial workers was convened with splendor.
					
					 The meeting will offer an important occasion in bringing about great innovation and leaping progress, effecting a drastic turn in developing the country's light industry with our own strength and technology and locally available resources and raising the standard of the material and cultural lives of the people to higher level amid the drive for making the industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					 Greeting them at Pyongyang Railway Station were Pak Pong Ju, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other  officials of the Party Central Committee.

articles.title: Lot of Poems Produced
articles.content:
Lots of Poems Produced
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The College of Literature of Kim Il Sung University produced lots of poems reflecting the spiritual world of all the service personnel and the people who have turned out in an all-out action against the U.S. imperialists and their allies.
					 Upon hearing the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, teachers and students produced dozens of poems in a few days. 
					
					 Poems titled "The DPRK's  resentment has burst out", "Songun Korea declared", "Let's force the U.S. to pay for all crimes", "March 8 and war" and "No empty talk" represent the resolution of all people of the DPRK to devotedly fight a do-or-die battle for defending their true life and happiness and the dignified socialist country. 
					
					 Among them are poems dealing with the will of the people to join the army and blow up the strongholds of the enemy in the spirit of "at a blow" once Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order. 
					
					 Such poems as "I sing of victory" and "Wait, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Monument" reflect the firm belief that only victory is always in store for the army and people of the DPRK  all out to accomplish the just cause.

articles.title: Lawn Machines Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Lawn Machines Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A building-machine repair factory in Pyongyang has developed various kinds of hand machines helpful to creating lawn.
					 Among them are turf mower, seed collector and seeder.
					
					 In particular, the seeding machine manufactured at this factory is well received by its users, and the demand for it is growing throughout the country.
					
					 The machine weighs 19.2 kg and its size is 1 000mm×480mm×720mm. Its seeding width is 1,200-2 000mm and it is able to seed 2,000-4,000㎡ per hour.
					
					 Choe Yong Su, chief engineer of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 "Users of our factory's products say that they are very effective and better than other countries' as they need no electricity and oil.
					
					 It's our hope that those machines will be conducive to further greening the country."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Halt to Activities of Panmunjom Mission of KPA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Halt to Activities of Panmunjom Mission of KPA
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's step to completely halt the activities of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) is a decisive option to mercilessly foil the moves of the hostile forces, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article on Wednesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The mission is a negotiating mechanism which the army of the DPRK tentatively established and operated in order to establish a peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The moves of the U.S. and its south Korean puppet regime for a war of aggression have virtually reduced the Korean Armistice Agreement to a dead paper.
					
					 It is natural to cut the DPRK-U.S. military hotline in Panmunjom as there is no need for the former to be bound to the agreement and talking does not work on the war maniacs.
					
					 The DPRK's option has become clear now that the bellicose forces have entered a full-scale phase of implementation in their moves to realize their scenario for invading it, in violation of its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 It is necessary to eliminate everything lying in the way of starting a just war, revolutionary war to counter a war of aggression.
					
					 It is the firm stand of the DPRK to deal limitless blows of justice at any target as it pleases at any place any time, free from any restriction, and accomplish the great cause for national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation. 
					
					 The second and third strong countermeasures to be taken by the DPRK will strikingly demonstrate its tremendous military power and they will be steps to be taken in advance to root out the source of confrontation and war on the Korean Peninsula and victoriously conclude the great war for national reunification.
					
					 It is very just for the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity for lasting peace and stability on the peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defense Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defense Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense is the best means of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent put a definite end to the distress-torn history of the nation in which flunkeyism was regarded as a "lever for preserving the nation," the history of stateless nation in which it was deprived of sovereign right as it had no matchlock and it was unable to protect even the name of the country.
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialist reactionaries can no longer provoke the DPRK.
					
					 Its access to nuclear deterrent for self-defense enabled the Korean nation to live under clear and blue sky and hand a peaceful land to posterity.
					
					 The DPRK's emergence as nuclear weapons state made a breakthrough in the age-old  world political structure centered on nuclear powers and made it possible for it to stand firm against the U.S. styling itself the "world's only superpower".
					
					 The DPRK emerged a strong power exerting great influence on the world politics and building an independent world order. It has also made it possible to wage a dynamic struggle against imperialism and the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent serves as a means common to the nation for defending the territory of the whole of Korea, not just the DPRK, and protecting and glorifying all the Koreans in the north and the south.
					
					 All the service personnel and the people of the great Paektusan nation will never allow the nation's sovereignty and dignity to be infringed upon and the supreme interests of the country to be threatened.
					
					 Songun Korea is sure to emerge victorious as it is possessed of powerful nuclear deterrent, the article concludes.

articles.title: US and Its Followers' Anti-DPRK Remarks Blasted: Minju Joson
articles.content:
US and Its Followers' Anti-DPRK Remarks Blasted: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers are blaring that the DPRK is "escalating provocations" and opting for "military adventures". 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a revelation of their vicious intention to cover the criminal nature of their nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK, shift the blame for the worsening tension on the Korean Peninsula onto it and justify their moves for stifling it.
					
					 The crucial measures taken by the DPRK are very just ones for self-defence inevitably chosen by it to cope with the grave situation in which the sovereignty and dignity of the nation are encroached upon and the supreme interests of the country threatened.
					
					 By nature, the DPRK had no plan to conduct the third underground nuclear test and had not taken into consideration the nullification of the Korean Armistice Agreement and halt to the activities of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 However, the U.S. brought the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, an exercise of the just and independent right of the DPRK, for discussion of the UN Security Council, groundlessly terming it a "long-range missile launch", and instigated its satellite countries into cooking up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. So, it urgently needed the peaceful circumstances and stable situation but was compelled to counter the enemies' moves with such countermeasure as conducting the third underground nuclear test as the sovereignty and dignity of the country is more valuable than them.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers, far from drawing a due lesson from this, are resorting to tougher "sanctions" and seeking to ignite a new war at any cost through the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in line with them.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the army and people of the DPRK to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialist aggressors and certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification, the greatest cherished desire of the nation, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Former S. Korean "Minister of Unification"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Former S. Korean "Minister of Unification"
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Ryu U Ik, former south Korean "minister of Unification", Monday cried out for "human rights" and "substantial preparations for unification" after letting loose such remarks that "the north is making extremely irresponsible statements in the wake of its nuclear test, going against the reason of the world."
					 He also made such lie that the Lee Myung Bak regime "sought to develop south-north relations and help each other to survive and achieve co-prosperity."
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Ryu said is no more than despicable, reckless remarks to mislead the public opinion in a bid to cover up his treachery at any cost.
					
					 As for Ryu, he is one of the arch criminals who have deteriorated the inter-Korean relations since he assumed the post of the "minister of Unification" in September 2011 with the backing of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Ryu let out the above-said vituperations getting on the nerves of the DPRK, instead of making apology for the crimes against the nation, embellishing Lee's policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen. This is a clear evidence of the mockery of the angry mindset.
					
					 He is piffling jargon to cover up his dirty colors as a supporter of the Lee regime's confrontation policy and get rid of his miserable plight, condemned by all Koreans, but his sleight of hand can never work.
					
					 This would only add to his crimes, precipitating his tragic end.
					
					 All Koreans will never set free Lee and Ryu, who do more harm than any good to Koreans, and call them to task to the last for their treachery against reunification and bring them to justice. -0-

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Former S. Korean Unification Minister
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Former S. Korean Unification Minister
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Ryu U Ik, former "minister of Unification" of south Korea, who earned an ill fame as a trumpeter for traitor Lee Myung Bak's confrontation policy, has continued fiery rhetoric against the DPRK even after his retirement from his office.
					 In his retirement speech on March 11, he slandered the social system in the DPRK, saying it goes against the reason of the world.
					
					 An adage goes that where no shame is, there is no fear. Ryu's remarks are part of his anti-DPRK rhetoric aimed to cover up his treason of plunging the north-south ties into a complete deadlock.
					
					  Ryu is a top-class waiting maid who has long served Lee Myung Bak in his division and confrontation policy.
					
					 Ryu contributed to Lee's taking power by drafting "election" commitment proposals and speeches such deceptive "commitment to great canal of peninsula" and "Nadulsom plan".
					
					 For the past little more than one year after taking the post of the "minister of Unification", Ryu has continued confrontation rhetoric and moves. This was not just coincidental.
					
					 Those supporting the traitor were educated in contents opposing reunification and the "Unification Ministry" openly involved in the abduction of Koreans in the third country. This was all Ryu's brainchild.
					
					 He called for "flexible north policy" in words but, in actuality, he barred visits, contacts, cooperation and exchanges among NGOs, saying that "May 24 measure" can not be retracted. He made no scruple of agitating people not to make investment in the north even in foreign countries.
					
					 He turned down south Koreans' demand for Pyongyang visit to pay respects and share grief with northerners over the great loss to the nation, citing "May 24 measure". He even cried out for "military sanctions" against the fellow countrymen as part of his moves for standing in confrontation with the north to the last.
					
					 He also took the lead in the Lee Myung Bak's "unification jar" farce which was rejected as the jar of division and confrontation by south Koreans from all walks of life.
					
					 All facts prove that the north-south ties that were pushed to the lowest ebb since Lee's taking power are partly attributable to persistent and vicious machinations of Ryu and other sycophantic traitors.
					
					 It was quite natural that the south Koreans branded the "Unification Ministry" as the ministry of confrontation against unification and sentenced the Lee regime, hotbed of confrontation and division, to a political death.
					
					 Human scum Ryu is mistaken if he thinks he can evade the responsibility for the crime of deteriorating the north-south ties by making any base rhetoric.
					
					 The Korean nation will certainly settle accounts with Ryu as well as with Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: GIs' Presence in S. Korea Is Root Cause of Nation's Misfortune: KCNA
articles.content:
GIs' Presence in S. Korea Is Root Cause of Nation's Misfortune: KCNA
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- GIs present in south Korea committed shuddering crimes recently, touching off great anger of south Koreans.
					 At night on March 2, three GIs rampaged through Seoul streets, firing at passers-by and riding a truck over policemen with impunity.
					
					 These monstrous crimes are a product of the policy of despising south Koreans, arrogance and high-handed practices.
					
					 From the first day of their presence in south Korea the U.S. imperialist aggression troops have committed plunder, murder and violence against south Koreans by employing the most barbarous methods, thereby inflicting untold misfortune and pain on them.
					
					 Massacres of civilians on Jeju Island and in Rogun-ri and Maehyang-ri are typical examples showing GIs' barbarity.
					
					 The nation was shocked at monstrous crimes that will make even animals blush such as the incidents of tonsuring a woman in Tongduchon, painting a woman in Uijongbu, committing sexual assault against a little girl and killing Yun Kum I, Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son.
					
					 Murders, violence and plunder are an inevitable product of the U.S. military presence in south Korea and they have become daily occurrences.
					
					 GIs' crimes numbered more than 100,000 for decades after the shackling "Status of Forces Agreement" entered into effect and five cases occur on a daily average at the moment.
					
					 It is only south Korea where the brigandish "Agreement" is in force, openly conniving at the murders and violence by foreign aggression forces, in the present era of high human civilization.
					
					  It is shame on the nation that the south Koreans have their fate ruthlessly violated, being subject to insult and contempt.
					
					 The U.S. military presence in south Korea has caused division and grievous deaths of Koreans.
					
					 The nearly 70-year-long history of the U.S. military presence in south Korea proves that the aggressors' barbarous nature remains unchanged and will never change.
					
					 Problem is that the south Korean puppets continue acts of sycophantic treachery, prolonging their remaining days while clinging to the coattail of the aggressors, in disregard of the misfortune and pain of the south Koreans.
					
					 Traitors are sure to face stern judgment of history as they take the lead in anti-DPRK confrontation rackets with their guns pointed at the fellow countrymen who turned out to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The south Koreans should wage more dynamic actions to pull the U.S. forces out of their land and sweep away all the pro-U.S. sycophants and traitors. This is the only way of ending GIs' crimes in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Marine Corps Plans Military Drill on Forefront Areas
articles.content:
S. Korean Marine Corps Plans Military Drill in Forefront Areas
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- "Chongryong" unit of the south Korean puppet Marine Corps announced that it would stage a combined drill to cope with someone's provocation in the areas of Kanghwa County, Inchon City, and Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province from March 13 to 15, south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					 The warmongers said they would stage drills for mobile task force actions, night coastal firing, etc. to help various units increase command and control functions and boost the capability for coordinated operations with relevant institutions.
					
					 It was reported that even administrative organs, police and reserve forces in Kimpho City and Kanghwa County would be involved in the drills.
					
					 This saber-rattling to be staged, timed to coincide with the ongoing Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, brings to light the bellicose nature of those hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen and moves for a war against the north.

articles.title: Stop to War Drills against DPRK Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to War Drills against DPRK Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress, the People's Strength for Building New Society, the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and other organizations and opposition parties of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Mar. 9 in protest against the north-targeted war drills.
					 At the meeting the speakers held that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills under way across south Korea are not simple military exercises but the ones for a war, demanding an immediate stop to them.
					
					 A statement was read out there.
					
					 It accused the U.S. and the south Korean authorities of frantically pursuing the hostile policy towards the DPRK, seized with such wild dream as seeking the "collapse of the regime in the north".
					
					 Thousands of satellites have been launched, the statement noted, adding that the prevailing grave situation can hardly be settled as long as such unfair action as slapping "sanctions" against the north only persists.
					
					 "Sanctions", pressure and high-profile war drills will only invite a military conflict, it said, declaring they would stage actions in solidarity with people of various circles to put an end to the war moves and to establish a perfect peace-keeping mechanism.
					
					 It called upon people of various circles to become vocal in their protest against the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Then, the participants sent to the U.S. embassy a protest message addressed to the U.S. chief executive.

articles.title: Halt to Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Pusan of south Korea gathered on March 9 to protest against the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers' anti-DPRK war maneuvers.
					 They included the Pusan Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Women's Society and the Youth Association.
					
					 The joint military exercises can be a fuse for a war, they said, demanding an immediate halt to the exercises.
					
					 They accused the south Korean military authorities of making a very dangerous reckless remark that they would not rule out a war.
					
					 World War II broke out without a previous notice, they noted, adding if any trifling action that can lead to a war is allowed to proceed, it will bring about an irretrievable consequence.
					
					 They called on the people of different social strata throughout south Korea to choose the way for peace against war at a crossroad of war or peace.
					
					 The gathering was followed by a demo of its participants.

articles.title: Stop to North-targeted War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to North-targeted War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement on March 7 denouncing the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for their joint military exercises.
					 A war is unavoidable on the Korean Peninsula unless the U.S. "sanctions" racket and war exercises against the north are halted, the statement said.
					
					 The U.S. is to blame for the prevailing situation, the statement noted, accusing it of kicking up the "sanctions" racket while taking issue with the north over its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, an application satellite.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are bringing the second Korean war, it said, demanding an immediate halt to the war maneuvers aimed to hurl people as cannon fodder.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to opt for improving relations with the north, not joining the U.S. in its moves against the north.
					
					 Now is the time for the people to turn out in the action for peace against war, it said, stressing: Progressive forces should wage a dynamic struggle to achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula, holding high the slogan calling for opposition to the unreasonable "sanctions" against the north and stop to the war maneuvers.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Oppose North-targeted War Maneuvers
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Oppose North-targeted War Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century held a press conference in Seoul on March 10 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers for their war maneuvers against the north.
					 At the press conference the organization denounced the south Korean and U.S. authorities for driving the situation to a crisis, staging the Key Resolve exercises despite the warnings of the north.
					
					 If a war breaks out, youth will turn into mercenaries of the U.S. and be driven to killing civilians again, it deplored.
					
					 The south Korean and U.S. authorities have no right to deprive the people of their future, it said, demanding an immediate halt to the military exercises inciting a war crisis.

articles.title: Halt to Key Resolve Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Key Resolve Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- More than 30 civic and public organizations of south Korea held a joint press conference on March 11 opposing north-targeted Key Resolve joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers.
					 A press release was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It exposed the nature of the north-targeted Key Resolve started by the south Korean and U.S. authorities that day.
					
					 The Ministry of Defense is describing the drill as an "annual defensive one", but it is a sheer lie, the press release noted.
					
					 In the light of the military drill being conducted pursuant to the plan for invading the north with huge armed forces and preemptive nuclear strike means involved, one can see that the drill is aimed to gain the goal for offensive operations, it held.
					
					 The south Korean and U.S. military authorities defined the saber-rattling as a demonstration of the armed forces to the north, an indication that it has become more threatening than ever before, it said.
					
					 It urged the warmongers to immediately stop the north-targeted war exercises.
					
					 It stressed the need to wage broad actions to remove the danger of a war.

articles.title: Total Revision of SOFA Demanded
articles.content:
Total Revision of SOFA Demanded
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on March 6 held a press conference in Seoul demanding a total revision of the unequal south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA).
					 At the press release the organization recalled that GI criminals in south Korea went on shooting spree against passers-by in front of a hotel in Rithaewon-dong, Ryongsan District, Seoul on March 2.
					
					 It demanded that those criminals be severely punished as they threatened the security and lives of the people.
					
					 In the wake of the incident, the deputy commander of the U.S. Eighth Army talked about "regret" and "cooperation in investigation", but he has not yet handed the criminals to the south Korean side, it said.
					
					 It urged the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea to make an official apology and immediately hand the criminals to the south Korean side.
					
					 It demanded a total revision of SOFA, the source of deliberate crimes of U.S. troops.

articles.title: Scandals of S. Korean Defence Minister-designate Disclosed
articles.content:
Scandals of S. Korean Defence Minister-designate Disclosed 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference on March 7 at which it disclosed scandals of Kim Pyong Gwan, defense minister-designate. 
					 The organization held that Kim Pyong Gwan was involved in many scandals in the past while holding important posts in the army. 
					
					 It charged that scam-tainted Kim should not be allowed to hold such post. 
					
					 It urged Kim to give up his candidacy for the defence minister pronto.

articles.title: S. Korean Women Demand Guarantee of Their Rights
articles.content:
S. Korean Women Demand Guarantee of Their Rights
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Women workers of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on March 8 in demand of their rights.
					 At the rally speakers said that women are withering, subject to harsh discrimination and instable employment due to the misrule of the "government" authorities.
					
					 More than 10,000 women part-timers were dismissed shortly ago, they said, noting that this shows how the women's lives are being trampled down in south Korean society.
					
					 They called upon the women to turn out in actions to build society free from discrimination and contempt where the women's rights are guaranteed.
					
					 At the end of the rally its participants staged a demonstration, shouting slogans "Ensure stable jobs!" "Let's win women's rights to work!" "Let's build new society by efforts of women workers!" and "Let's win a drastic rise of minimum wages and wages for living!"

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Declares Action for Repeal of Evil Law
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Declares Action for Repeal of Evil Law
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on March 9 to disclose the crime-woven office of traitor Lee Myung Bak characterized by invocation of the fascist law.
					 At the meeting, the speakers recalled that after Lee came to power the number of those who were arrested on charges of violation of the "Security Law" increased every year and crackdown continued in the whole period of his office.
					
					 The invocation of the SL was so deliberate during his five-year office that it was applied to every case, they said, adding that's why international organizations recommended the repeal of the law.
					
					 The organization in a resolution vowed to stage actions for the repeal of the SL and other evil laws against human rights and the release of all prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Stop to Joint Military Exercises Demanded by Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Stop to Joint Military Exercises Demanded by Chongryon Officials
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The chairmen of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, Hokkaido, Kyoto, Osaka, Aichi, Ibaragi, Miyagi, Hiroshima, Hyogo, Saitama, Kanagawa prefectural headquarters, Nishi Tokyo Headquarters, Chiba and Fukuoka prefectural headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements on Monday in protest against the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers.
					 The nuclear war maneuvers for aggression that have reached an extreme phase are military provocations aimed to stifle the DPRK from A to Z, a mockery of peace and wanton violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement, the statements said.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could hold sway over the world and Songun Korea will never allow the U.S high-handed practices, they noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand the DPRK and if the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces fire even a single shell into the territory and waters of the DPRK, they will not be able to escape destruction.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet regime should stop at once their racket for a nuclear war and no longer block the Korean people from achieving the prosperity of the country and its peaceful reunification.
					
					 The statements called upon officials under all headquarters of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan to join the compatriots in the homeland in their actions to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and the supreme interests of the country to the last.

articles.title: Vishwanath Supports Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Vishwanath Supports Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Victory is in store for the army and people of the DPRK all out to defend the sovereignty.
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, said this in a statement on March 5 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 He accused the U.S. and its followers of fabricating a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch and staging joint military exercises in south Korea with huge forces involved.
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the KPA to cope with the grave situation prevailing in Korea is an expression of the just stand for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. had better behave itself, well aware that the army and people of the DPRK never make an empty talk.
					
					 It should stop the provocative war maneuvers for aggression at once and withdraw its aggressor troops from south Korea, bearing in mind that its hostile moves against the DPRK will never help settle anything. 
					
					 If the U.S. persists in the war rackets against the DPRK, it will face stronger retaliatory blows from the army and people of the DPRK who regard their sovereignty as their life and soul.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War to Be Commemorated in Pakistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War to Be Commemorated in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani national preparatory committee was inaugurated on Mar. 3 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Amar Jit, a senator, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 There were speeches at the inaugural meeting.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, referred in detail to the fact that the DPRK's army and people won a shining victory in the three year-long Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 On July 27, 1953 the heroic Korean People's Army and people defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of their "mightiness", he noted, adding that this day is celebrated as the day of their second liberation. He paid tribute to the President, who defended the sovereignty of Korea with his outstanding and seasoned leadership.
					
					 The general secretary of the Sind Provincial Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party praised the President as an invincible and iron-willed brilliant commander who liberated Korea by leading an arduous and bloody struggle with the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Shahida Wijarat, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, said the President's cause of reunifying the country was successfully carried forward by Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, who made sure that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted. This cause is now being inherited by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, he added.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on March 6 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warlike forces kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression in a bid to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					
					 An extremely tense situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the hostile forces' criminal moves for aggression to bring down socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 The spokesman for the Supreme Command of the KPA in a statement announced important measures which call for taking the second and third strong counteractions in succession, completely declaring invalid the Korean Armistice Agreement and stopping the activities of the Panmunjom mission of the KPA.
					
					 We fully support the just and decisive measures of the DPRK for self-defence to cope with the frantic and criminal moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers for a war of aggression.
					
					 The "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK are little short of a declaration of war against it and they will be followed by strong countermeasures.

articles.title: Peruvian Organizations Assail US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Peruvian Organizations Assail US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee to Remember Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the Peruvian Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples released a joint statement on Mar. 6 in denunciation of the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers to ignite a new war.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We fully support the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) which clarified that it would take important measures to cope with the evermore undisguised hostile acts of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges against the DPRK and their war maneuvers for aggression kicked off on Mar. 1.
					
					 In January last the U.S. prodded the UN Security Council and its allies into fabricating a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes, in wanton violation of its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces describe the on-going war maneuvers for aggression with huge troops and even nuclear strike means involved as "annual".
					
					 The U.S. should draw a lesson from its bitter defeat during the last Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should stop their rash acts, bearing deep in mind that the KPA is a strong army capable of beating back any formidable enemy as it has the brilliant Songun commander Marshal Kim Jong Un as its supreme commander.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for defending the country's sovereignty and achieving the cause of national reunification. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica de unidad 531 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica de unidad 531 del EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio en compania de los militares del EPC la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad 531 del EPC.
					La funcion ha sido programada con piezas de diferentes generos, tales como la narracion y coro "La fuerza de Corea", el drama de agitacion "Logremos cosecha mas abundante de soya", la charla comica "Hagamos brillar el nombre del ejercito popular", la poesia y narracion "Tenemos delante el mar Sur", el coro "Todos seran balas y bombas".
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron en tono energico el modo de reaccion del EPC que se enfrenta con espada al cuchillo, con canones a los fusiles y con el mas poderoso medio de ataque nuclear a precision a la amenaza nuclear de los enemigos.
					
					Viendo la funcion, los espectadores juraron terminar con victoria la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria exterminando a los enemigos con el poderoso fuego de represalia cuando les ordene el Comandante Supremo.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del citado grupo hayan realizado esta magnifica funcion que describe bien las cualidades ideo-espirituales y el impetu combativo del ejercito popular que piensa siempre en el combate y saldra victorioso del combate con los enemigos.
					
					Esta funcion refleja bien la severa situacion de hoy y ha sido perfecta y clara en su tema ideologico, evaluo el Mariscal.
					
					Le acompanaron en disfrutarla Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Hyon Chol Hae y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINFAP advierte a belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINFAP advierte a belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 13 la siguiente declaracion: 
					Frente a los cada vez mas brutales actos hostiles anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea declaro el 5 de marzo al interior y exterior del pais su firme decision que representa la voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					Pero, los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana actuan como perros rabiosos sin volverse en si.
					
					El pasado dia 6, el jefe del departamento operacional de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano dijo que cuando inicie la justa accion de la RPDC, movilizara los medios militares para "dar el golpe de represalia" no solo al "foco" de accion sino hasta a las "fuerzas de apoyo y de mando". 
					
					El dia 8, el portavoz del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea calumnio atrevidamente hasta nuestra maxima dignidad diciendo que si la RPDC provista de armas nucleares entra en el enfrentamiento total, "eliminara del planeta verde al regimen norcoreano con la voluntad de la humanidad".
					
					Entre tanto, Kim Pyong Gwan, nominado como ministro de Defensa Nacional del nuevo poder surcoreano para sustituir al gangster militar Kim Kwan Jin, chismeo tambien que "respondera al enfrentamiento total de la RPDC con la sustitucion o derrumbe del poder norcoreano usando hasta la guerra psicologica". 
					
					Tal belicismo de la capa militar surcoreana no esta enajenado de las palabras virulentas de la inquilina de Chongwadae como "hay que hacer todo lo posible para la seguridad", "no se puede defender el pais solo con armas" y "se arruinara el pais que se concentra unicamente a las fuerzas militares como armas nucleares, etc.". 
					
					El problema esta en que tales movimientos coinciden con la entrada en etapa crucial de los ejercicios conjuntos de guerra nuclear EE.UU.-Sur de Corea "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle". 
					
					Lo calificamos de repeticion de la fracasada postura conflictiva del poder de Lee Myung Bak y de expresion de la ignorancia sobre el valioso patrimonio de la nacion. 
					
					La nacion y el ejercito del pueblo con armas nucleares siempre triunfan en la batalla aunque se enfrentan con enemigos poderosos y garantizan mas firmemente la prosperidad y la seguridad del pais. 
					
					Esto es la realidad, que nos da el mundo de hoy donde predomina la ley de selva, y la leccion de sangre que sacamos de la aguda confrontacion antiyanqui que continua siglo tras siglo.
					
					Demandarnos "renunciar" las armas nucleares, patrimonio de la nacion digno de hacer alarde al mundo, y "abandonar el Songun", que defiende la paz de este territorio desde la agresion y las maniobras de guerra de las fuerzas extranjeras, no pasa de ser un disparate de los idiotas incapaces de justipreciar la realidad. 
					
					En particular, es un crimen nunca tolerable describir como "provocacion" nuestro enfrentamiento total para frustrar las maniobras de guerra de agresion de los gangsteres, que se acometen en colectivo con el fin de acabar con la soberania nacional, y tratar de quitarnos hasta las armas nucleares preparadas para defender el pais y la nacion.
					
					En correspondencia a nuestro justo enfrentamiento total, los habitantes surcoreanos y los oficiales y soldados del ejercito surcoreano deben apuntar sus fusiles a los cabecillas belicistas del circulo militar, al darse cuenta de que no se puede confiar en la horda de tales traidores la soberania ni el destino de la nacion.
					
					La sucia locura de los belicistas de la capa militar titere es el acto traidor anacronico con que obedece ciegamente a la exigencia bandidesca del amo gringo tendente a ocupar lo todo de nuestro pais, nuestra nacion sin distinguir la justicia y la verdad de la injusticia y la falsedad.
					
					 La supuesta decision de EE.UU. y otras potencias tomada con la coaccion y la arbitrariedad nunca sera la justicia.
					
					 Igualmente la supuesta "resolucion"  aprobada por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU convertido en el mecanismo de votacion sin la imparcialidad y el equilibrio, tampoco sera jamas la verdad.
					
					  Por mucho que se acumulen la injusticia y la falsedad, no seran la justicia y la verdad y se revelara su aspecto verdadero ante la epoca y la historia.
					
					  La lucha indoblegable del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea por defender la soberania y el derecho a vivir de la nacion y el interes supremo del pais, es la justicia que demuestra la historia y la verdad que ilumina la epoca.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC poseyeron el diversificado disuasivo nuclear de precision apretando el cinturon y optaron el camino del Songun muy espinoso, porque alli hay la justicia que frustra la injusticia y la verdad que revela la falsedad.
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea no conocen tal realidad porque estan contagiados con la adoracion a EE.UU. y el servilismo a las grandes potencias.
					
					Se dice que el hombre y la nacion practican el servilismo a las grandes potencias el primero se convierte en tonto y la segunda se arruinara.
					
					Esto es una ley comprobada en la larga historia de la humanidad.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no estaran mas con los brazos cruzados ante las conductas groseras de los belicistas de la capa militar que encargaron a su amo gringo el derecho de operacion en tiempo guerra conocida como una vida del ejercito y le entregan a sus oficiales y soldados como carne de canon y de bala.
					
					Por esa razon, hemos definido a EE.UU. y sus satelites dentro del circulo militar surcoreano como blancos principales del enfrentamiento total por la defensa de soberania y como los primeros a ser exterminados.
					
					Los belicistas militares surcoreanos deben tener presente que ya no es vigente el Acuerdo de Armisticio ni se comprometera a la declaracion de no agresion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Lo que queda es la accion de justicia, o sea, implacable venganza de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					  Los titeres surcoreanos deben volverse en si.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun se reune con nuevo embajador indio
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun se reune con nuevo embajador indio
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, departio este miercoles con el nuevo embajador de la Republica de la India en Corea, Ajay Kumar Sharma, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: ACNC comenta chismes de Ryu U Ik contra RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta chismes de Ryu U Ik contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El ex ministro de Unificacion surcoreano, Ryu U Ik, que gano la mala fama de portavoz de la politica conflictiva del traidor Lee Myung Bak, calumnio nuevamente el regimen norcoreano en su "discurso de retirada" hecho el dia 11, chismeando que la RPDC "actua en contra del principio del cielo".
					 Parece que el recurre a la chismografia para ocultar su crimen de haber roto las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					  Ryu es brazo derecho de Lee Myung Bak que hizo gran aporte a la toma de posesion de este al idear las "promesas electorales" y elaborar el texto de discurso.
					
					  En poco mas de un ano en su cargo, Ryu pronuncio disparates conflictivos en el mismo tono que su superior Lee.
					
					  Entre los inventos del ex ministro hay el inicio de la educacion anti-reunificacion para los partidarios del traidor Lee y la abierta intervencion del Ministerio de Unificacion en el secuestro de compatriotas en los terceros paises.
					
					 Aunque abogaba por la "flexible politica al Norte", en realidad obstruyo caso por caso el viaje reciproco, el contacto, la cooperacion y el intercambio entre las entidades civiles del Norte y el Sur diciendo que no puede cancelar la "medida del 24 de mayo", e hizo sin vacilacion alguna hasta en ultramar la sucia agitacion a no invertir en la RPDC.
					
					  En virtud de esa medida, cancelo la demanda de habitantes surcoreanos de distintos sectores de que les autorice visitar a Pyongyang para expresar condolencias por el gran duelo nacional (deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il) compartiendo la tristeza con los norcoreanos.
					
					  Igualmente, intento enfrentarse hasta el final con la connacional RPDC hablando hasta de la "sancion militar" contra esta.
					
					  Se puso en la delantera de la farsa del "tinajon de unificacion", fondo ideado por Lee Myung Bak y rechazado en distintos estratos como tinajon de division y confrontacion.
					
					 Como demuestran los hechos, Ryu U Ik y otros vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias llevaron a la peor fase las relaciones intercoreanas despues de la llegada al poder de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Por eso, los habitantes de distintos sectores de la sociedad surcoreana calificaron el Ministerio de Unificacion de cartera de confrontacion y anti-unificacion y condenaron a la muerte politica al "poder" de Lee.
					
					  Estaria muy equivocado si esa escoria humana piensa que podra eludir el castigo a su crimen de haber roto las relaciones N-S con su sucia chismografia.
					
					La nacion coreana balanceara hasta el final de los crimenes de Lee y Ryu y los condenara a la horca.
